parameters.name: Subscription
parameters.query:
resourcecontainers
| where type == "microsoft.resources/subscriptions"
| order by name asc
| extend rn=row_number()
| project value = strcat('/subscriptions/', subscriptionId), label = name, selected = iif(rn == 1, true, false)

content.json: This workbook can be used to assess the components already deployed in the **{Subscription:label}** subscription, against recommended practises in alignment with the [Cloud Adoption Framework](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/cloud-adoption-framework/).

content.query:
where type == "microsoft.network/publicipaddresses"
| summarize ['Number of public IP addresses']=count()
content.title: Total Public IPs

content.query:
resourcecontainers
| where type == "microsoft.resources/subscriptions"
| extend inManagementGroup = iif(isnotempty(tags), "True", "False"),
	spendingLimit = properties.subscriptionPolicies.spendingLimit,
	state = properties.state
| project id, name, type, tenantId, inManagementGroup, spendingLimit, state
content.title: Azure Subscription Status

content.query:
Resources
| project tags
| where tags != "{}"
| where tags != ""
| where tags notcontains "AutomationAccountARMID"
| where tags notcontains "hidden-link"
| where tags notcontains "hidden-title"
| where tags notcontains "Azure Site Recovery Service"
| where tags notcontains "azure-cloud-shell"
| mvexpand tags
| summarize Events=count() by tostring(tags)
| order by Events desc
content.title: Azure Tag Usage
content.noDataMessage: No tags have been detected. Please consider implementing tags for easier organisation of your resources and billing purposes.

content.query:
resources
| where type contains "microsoft.operationalinsights"
| extend sku = properties.sku.name,
	createdDate = properties.createdDate,
	dataIngestionStatus = properties.workspaceCapping.dataIngestionStatus,
	dailyQuotaGb = tostring(properties.workspaceCapping.dailyQuotaGb),
	retentionInDays = properties.retentionInDays
| extend sku = case(sku == "pergb2018", "Per GB PAYG", sku == "standalone", "Legacy PAYG", sku)
| extend dailyQuotaGb = iff(dailyQuotaGb == "-1.0", "No limit", dailyQuotaGb)
| project id, name, location, resourceGroup, sku, createdDate, dataIngestionStatus, dailyQuotaGb, retentionInDays

content.query:
securityresources
| where type == "microsoft.security/securescores"
| extend subScorePercentage = todouble(properties.score.current)/todouble(properties.score.max)
| extend subScorePercentageXsubWeight = todouble(subScorePercentage)*todouble(properties.weight)
| summarize upperValue = sum(subScorePercentageXsubWeight), underValue = sum(todouble(properties.weight))
| extend overallScore = round(100*((upperValue)/(underValue)))
content.title: Azure Security Center Secure Score

content.query:

| extend subnets = todynamic(properties.subnets)

| summarize count() by nsg

content.query:

| where type == "microsoft.network/virtualnetworkgateways"
| extend sku = todynamic(properties.sku)
| project name, type, location, resourceGroup, sku.name, sku.tier, properties.gatewayType, properties.vpnType
content.title: Virtual Network Gateway List

content.query:
Resources
    | where type =~ 'microsoft.compute/virtualmachines'
    | project vmId = tolower(tostring(id)), vmName = name
    | join (Resources
        | where type =~ 'microsoft.network/networkinterfaces'
        | mv-expand ipconfig=properties.ipConfigurations
        | project vmId = tolower(tostring(properties.virtualMachine.id)), privateIp = ipconfig.properties.privateIPAddress, publicIpId = tostring(ipconfig.properties.publicIPAddress.id)
        | join kind=leftouter (Resources
            | where type =~ 'microsoft.network/publicipaddresses'
            | project publicIpId = id, publicIp = properties.ipAddress
        ) on publicIpId
        | project-away publicIpId, publicIpId1
        | summarize privateIps = make_list(privateIp), publicIps = make_list(publicIp) by vmId
    ) on vmId
    | project-away vmId1
    | sort by vmName asc
| where array_length(publicIps)>0
content.title: VMs with Public Ips directly assigned
content.noDataMessage: No VMs with DIrectly assigned Public Ips - good work!!!

content.query:
securityresources
| where type == "microsoft.security/assessments"
| extend displayName = tostring(properties.displayName), 
	category = properties.metadata.categories,
		status = tostring(properties.status.code)
| where category contains "IdentityAndAccess"
| distinct displayName, status
| order by displayName asc
